title: Polly's bread and butter pudding
ingredients: ['10 slices pan bread, crusts removed', '275ml (10 fl oz) milk', '55g (2 oz) butter, melted', '55g (2 oz) soft brown sugar', '2 teaspoons mixed spice', '1 egg, beaten', '175g (6 oz) mixed dried fruit, eg raisins, sultanas, currants, mixed peel', 'grated rind of 1/2 an orange', 'freshly grated nutmeg (optional)']
